20101230023432.000|20101230023441.000|CC1|CHICAGO.

20101230023544.000|20101230023544.000|CC1|GASOLINE IS FOR AMERICANS TO USE
20101230023544.000|20101230023547.000|CC1|LESS.                           
20101230023547.000|20101230023548.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN FACT, WE HAVE   
20101230023548.000|20101230023550.000|CC1|BEEN USING LESS.                
20101230023550.000|20101230023552.000|CC1|GAS CONSUMPTION IN THE U.S. IS  
20101230023552.000|20101230023553.000|CC1|STILL BELOW ITS PEAK BEFORE THE 
20101230023553.000|20101230023554.000|CC1|RECESSION.
